ChangeList.Description: Added support for the delegated permission `VirtualEvent.Read` to the following operations of the [subscription](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) resource: [CREATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta), [GET](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [UPDATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-beta), and [DELETE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added support for the application permission `VirtualEvent.Read.All` to the following operations of the [subscription](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) resource: [CREATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta), [GET](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [UPDATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-beta), and [DELETE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added support for the delegated permission `VirtualEvent.Read` to the following operations of the [subscription](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource: [CREATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-1.0), [GET](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [UPDATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [DELETE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added support for the application permission `VirtualEvent.Read.All` to the following operations of the [subscription](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource: [CREATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-1.0), [GET](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [UPDATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [DELETE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added support for the delegated and application permission `OnlineMeetingRecording.Read.All` to the following operations of the [subscription](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) resource: [LIST](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [POST](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta), [GET](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [UPDATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-beta), [DELETE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), and [reauthorize](https:/learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-reauthorize?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added support for the delegated and application permission `OnlineMeetingTranscript.Read.All` to the following operations of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) resource: [LIST](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [POST](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta), [GET](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [UPDATE](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-beta), [DELETE](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), and [reauthorize](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-reauthorize?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the **printer** resource to the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **printTaskDefinition** resource to the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **printer** resource to the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **printTaskDefinition** resource to the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **notificationContentType** property to the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **notificationQueryOptions** property to the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **notificationContentType** property to the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **notificationQueryOptions** property to the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added [todoTask](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/todoTask?view=graph-rest-beta) to the resources supported for [change notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/webhooks).

Added [printTaskDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/printtaskdefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) to the resources supported for [change notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/webhooks).

Added [lifecycle notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/webhooks-lifecycle) for personal [chatMessage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-1.0), [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added [chatMessage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/presence) to the resources supported for [change notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/webhooks).

Removed the **includeProperties** property from the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) entity. This property is replaced by the **includeResourceData** property.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: change notifications delivered via Event Hub
ChangeList.Description: Added the ability to get [change notifications delivered via Event Hub](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/change-notifications-delivery-event-hubs).
ChangeList.Target: change notifications delivered via Event Hub

ChangeList.Description: Change tracking through [delta queries](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-delta) is available for Microsoft Graph for US Government.
Added [presence](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/presence) to the resources supported for [change notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/webhooks).

Added the [changeNotification](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/changenotification?view=graph-rest-1.0), [changeNotificationCollection](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/changenotificationcollection?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [resourceData](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/resourcedata?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources to the [change notification](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/webhooks?view=graph-rest-beta) API.

Added the [changeNotification](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/changenotification?view=graph-rest-beta), [changeNotificationCollection](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/changenotificationcollection?view=graph-rest-beta), and [changeNotificationEncryptedContent](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/changenotificationencryptedcontent?view=graph-rest-beta) resources for the [change notification](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/webhooks?view=graph-rest-beta) API.
Added support for [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription) in [Microsoft Cloud for US Government](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/deployments).

Added support for the delegated and application permission `OnlineMeetingRecording.Read.All` to the following operations of the [subscription](https:/learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource: [LIST](https:/learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-list?view=graph-rest-1.0), [POST](https:/learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-1.0), [GET](https:/learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [UPDATE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), [DELETE](https:/learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [reauthorize](https:/learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-reauthorize?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added support for the delegated and application permission `OnlineMeetingTranscript.Read.All` to the following operations of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource: [LIST](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-list?view=graph-rest-1.0), [POST](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-1.0), [GET](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [UPDATE](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), [DELETE](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [reauthorize](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/subscription-reauthorize?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Enabled change notifications support to [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) a subscription for [user-scoped chat notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/teams-changenotifications-chat?view=graph-rest-beta#subscribe-to-changes-at-the-user-level-preview).

Enabled change notifications support to [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-beta) a subscription for [user-scoped chat notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/teams-changenotifications-chat?view=graph-rest-beta#subscribe-to-changes-at-the-user-level-preview).

Enabled change notifications support to [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-beta) or [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-list?view=graph-rest-beta) a subscription for [user-scoped chat notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/teams-changenotifications-chat?view=graph-rest-beta#subscribe-to-changes-at-the-user-level-preview).

Enabled change notifications support to [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) a subscription for [user-scoped chat notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/teams-changenotifications-chat?view=graph-rest-beta#subscribe-to-changes-at-the-user-level-preview).

Enabled change notifications support to [reauthorize](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-reauthorize?view=graph-rest-beta) a subscription for [user-scoped chat notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/teams-changenotifications-chat?view=graph-rest-beta#subscribe-to-changes-at-the-user-level-preview).

Enabled the `$notifyOnUserSpecificProperties` query parameter when you subscribe either to [user-scoped chat notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/teams-changenotifications-chat#subscribe-to-changes-at-the-user-level-preview) or [notifications in a particular chat](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/teams-changenotifications-chat?view=graph-rest-beta#subscribe-to-changes-in-a-particular-chat).
